Package hu.bme.mit.theta.solver

package hu.bme.mit.theta.solver
This package contains the generic interfaces for SMT solvers. Use a concrete implementation of SolverFactory to create a Solver or an ItpSolver for interpolation. See Solver for more information about using solvers.
